bio: I am a loyal member supporting and contributing to the growth of the OPTIMISM community.
contributionDescription:
Thank you for sharing some of your activities as a loyal member.
I mint many NFTs on the Optimism platform,
send NFTs to my friends,
trade NFT tokens on various exchanges,
and support artists with their new NFT projects.
Thank you for this program, I am grateful for the opportunity and I hope to be lucky enough to receive a gift from the Optimism team. Optimism is my most beloved and loyal platform. I wish the project continued growth and success. Thank you, Optimism.

contributionLinks.description: pay gas fees on the OPTIMISM platform

impactDescription: I have spent a lot of time during the day learning about the Optimism platform. I choose the Optimism platform to trade on exchanges. I hold OP on CEX exchanges. I mint various NFTs on the OP platform. I share posts related to the Optimism project. I support musicians through NFTs when they are released for sale. I use gas fees for transfers and trading on the OP chain to support the project.
